snippet.title: Lantana Games Goes to Indie Arcade
snippet.description:
On January 16, 2016, Lantana Games brought Mondrian - Abstraction in Beauty to Indie Arcade: Coast to Coast at the Smithsonian American Art Museum. Check out some of the players' reactions from the show floor here!

Filmed on a Canon PowerShot Elph 320 HS

Special Thanks:
Danny Silvers, Chenylle Mercado, Hannah Hoyt, Karen Layman, Lindsay Grace, Chris Totten, Kaylin Lapan, Sam Paley, and the Smithsonian American Art Museum.

Music: Orphism from Mondrian - Abstraction in Beauty by Davidjohn Blodgett

http://www.lantanagames.com

Sign up for the Lantana Ledger and get 20% off all games and merchandise at events: http://eepurl.com/6T0PL
